channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: People Are Paying to Get Their Chatbots High on ‘Drugs’
item.description: An online marketplace is selling code modules that simulate the effects of cannabis, ketamine, cocaine, ayahuasca, and alcohol when they are uploaded ...

item.title: How to Watch the Final Meteor Shower of 2025
item.description: Conditions in the US should be perfect for the final meteor shower of 2025, with no moonlight present to interfere with spotting shooting stars.

item.title: Monzo board reportedly pushed out CEO Anil over IPO timing
item.description: A key issue, reportedly, was IPO timing.

item.title: Apple Engineers Are Inspecting Bacon Packaging to Help Level Up US Manufacturers
item.description: Initial participants in the new Apple Manufacturing Academy tell WIRED that the tech giant’s surprising frankness and hands-on support are already ben...

item.title: Tesla engaged in deceptive marketing for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving, judge rules
item.description: The judge ruled Tesla should have to suspend manufacturing and sales in California for 30 days, but the DMV stayed those rulings for 90 days to allow ...

item.title: DEI Died This Year. Maybe It Was Supposed To
item.description: I’m a Black staffer at WIRED. My position feels more precarious than ever. There’s a reason for that.

item.title: Google deepens consumer credit push in India with UPI-linked card
item.description: Google has entered India's growing co-branded credit card market by partnering with Axis Bank.

item.title: Weeks after raising $100M, investors pump another $180M into hot Indian startup MoEngage
item.description: The deal valued MoEngage at "well over" $900 million post-money.

item.title: Amazon reportedly in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI as circular deals stay popular
item.description: Amazon is in early discussions to invest as much as $10 billion in OpenAI in a deal that would see the AI lab using the e-commerce giant's AI chips.

item.title: Former Neuralink Exec Launches Organ Preservation Effort
item.description: Science Corporation, founded by Neuralink’s first president, Max Hodak, has unveiled a prototype machine to extend the life of organs for longer perio...
